member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.Compress(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Compresses files and folders into a zip file.
member.param: A string-array of file and folder names(paths).

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.Decompress(System.String,System.String)
member.param: A directory where the decompressed file to be placed.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.AddEntries(System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new zip file and writes all the entries from the specified zip file and the additional entries into the new zip file.
member.param: A zip file from which all the entries should be copied to a new zip file.
A string-array of file and folder names(paths).
A new zip file that will contain all the entries from the specified zip file and the added entries.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.RemoveEntries(System.String,System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new zip file and copies the desired entries from the specified zip file into the new zip file.
member.param: A zip file from which the desired entries should be copied to a new zip file.
Zip-entry names that should be excluded of coping into a new zip file.
A new zip file that will contain the desired zip-entries with their data.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.GetEntries(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the entries of the zip file.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.IsDirectory(java.util.zip.ZipEntry)
member.summary: Returns True if the entry is a directory otherwise returns False.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.FormatSize(System.Int64)
member.summary: Formats byte-size to bytes, KB, MB or GB.

member.name: M:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.CopyStream(java.io.InputStream,java.io.OutputStream,System.String)
member.summary: Copies binary data from one stream to another.

member.summary: Gets the count of processed files.

member.name: P:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.ProgressChangedEventArgs.ProgressPercentage

member.summary: Gets the compressed size of the zip file.

member.name: P:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.CompletedEventArgs.FileCount
member.summary: Gets the count of the compressed files in the archive.

member.name: P:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.CompletedEventArgs.OriginalSize

member.name: P:TI_Coder.ZipUtility.CompletedEventArgs.ZipFileName
